overview: Joel Kremke is one of the founders of Accellos. He has a passion for focusing on the results of the business without compromising the culture of the business. Prior to Accellos, Joel was VP of Sales and Marketing for the Distribution Business Unit of Infor Global Solutions. Under Joelâ€™s watch, the Distribution Group integrated several acquisitions around the globe and grew organically at a pace significantly in excess of the underlying market dynamics. Joel previously was General Manager of JBA Americas.
